item.title: Capture Totale
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The new highly concentrated serum with an instant "perfusion" effect deeply fuses with the skin to stimulate cellular synchronization in its every layer1. The face's plump curves and youthful contours are restored.
1In vitro tests on ingredient.
item.content:encoded:
The new highly concentrated serum with an instant “perfusion” effect deeply fuses with the skin to stimulate cellular synchronization in its every layer1. The face’s plump curves and youthful contours are restored.

1In vitro tests on ingredient.

item.title: Capture Totale
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: More beautiful and visibly younger upon waking... This is the feat of the new Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Creme, the remarkable skincare with a boosted age-defying, anti-fatigue formula. Enriched with Longoza Extract from the Dior Gardens and Grape Seed, the Night Creme stimulates the nighttime regenerative power of stem cells to correct visible, deep-set signs of aging and fatigue. Upon application: its enveloping texture frees facial features from tension. Upon waking, stress wrinkles disappear. Day after day: the skin is smoother and regains its plump volumes. The face appears rested.
item.content:encoded:
More beautiful and visibly younger upon waking… This is the feat of the new Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Creme, the remarkable skincare with a boosted age-defying, anti-fatigue formula.
Enriched with Longoza Extract from the Dior Gardens and Grape Seed, the Night Creme stimulates the nighttime regenerative power of stem cells to correct visible, deep-set signs of aging and fatigue.
Upon application: its enveloping texture frees facial features from tension.
Upon waking, stress wrinkles disappear.
Day after day: the skin is smoother and regains its plump volumes. The face appears rested.

item.title: Capture – Multi – Perfection
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Multi-Perfection Creme circumvents the laws of time and, for the 1st time*, those of gravity. This creme encourages the revitalization of the skin's precious "springs": the mother cells at the origin of the deep contouring of the skin**. Superbly smoothing, resculpting and unifying, it tones the skin from its deepest layers to its surface. The face is perfectly tautened and toned while all visible signs of aging - wrinkles, loss of firmness and radiance, and uneven skin tone - are corrected instantly and with every application. Youthful beauty is brought to its pinnacle. Today and tomorrow.
With its fine, delicate, melt-in texture for unrivaled sensory delight, the Multi-Perfection Creme Universal texture delivers an instant embellishing effect and optimal comfort for all women.
item.content:encoded:
The Multi-Perfection Creme circumvents the laws of time and, for the 1st time*, those of gravity. This creme encourages the revitalization of the skin’s precious “springs”: the mother cells at the origin of the deep contouring of the skin**.
Superbly smoothing, resculpting and unifying, it tones the skin from its deepest layers to its surface. The face is perfectly tautened and toned while all visible signs of aging – wrinkles, loss of firmness and radiance, and uneven skin tone – are corrected instantly and with every application. Youthful beauty is brought to its pinnacle. Today and tomorrow.

With its fine, delicate, melt-in texture for unrivaled sensory delight, the Multi-Perfection Creme Universal texture delivers an instant embellishing effect and optimal comfort for all women.

item.title: One Essential Mist – Lotion
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: One Essential Mist-Lotion is the first hybrid lotion1 with a triple anti-pollution action of cleansing, rebalancing and detoxifying. Targeting 100% of particles on the skin's surface2, its light and air-whipped texture also delivers instant freshness, awakening the complexion. In a single spray, the skin is free from toxins. 1. By Dior. 2. In vitro test on ingredients.
item.content:encoded:
One Essential Mist-Lotion is the first hybrid lotion1 with a triple anti-pollution action of cleansing, rebalancing and detoxifying. Targeting 100% of particles on the skin’s surface2, its light and air-whipped texture also delivers instant freshness, awakening the complexion.
In a single spray, the skin is free from toxins.
1. By Dior.
2. In vitro test on ingredients.

item.title: One Essential
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
One Essential combats the toxins by reinvigorating the elimination process* in order to restore the skin's luminosity. A three-dimensional action: DETOXIFIES: it continuously eliminates toxins* and frees the flow of energy at the heart of the skin. REGENERATES and ENERGIZES: it optimizes the correct functioning of cells. BOOSTS: it boosts by up to 4 times the effectiveness of ingredients* of your usual, subsequently applied skincare.
One Essential's fresh, air-whipped and slightly pinkish texture revives the complexion and instantly infuses it with radiance, without a pearlescent or tightening effect, nor a greasy feel.
item.content:encoded:
One Essential combats the toxins by reinvigorating the elimination process* in order to restore the skin’s luminosity. A three-dimensional action:
DETOXIFIES: it continuously eliminates toxins* and frees the flow of energy at the heart of the skin.
REGENERATES and ENERGIZES: it optimizes the correct functioning of cells.
BOOSTS: it boosts by up to 4 times the effectiveness of ingredients* of your usual, subsequently applied skincare.

One Essential’s fresh, air-whipped and slightly pinkish texture revives the complexion and instantly infuses it with radiance, without a pearlescent or tightening effect, nor a greasy feel.

item.title: Dior Prestige
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Dior Prestige Le Nectar de Nuit is concentrated in the most precious fraction of Rose de Granville: its very first buds. They potentiate the skin's nighttime cell regeneration for 8 hours*. Signs of aging are more rapidly, intensely and deeply corrected. Upon the first application, the skin regains a fine, even texture and its radiance is boosted. Wrinkles are smoothed and signs of fatigue are diminished. Night after night, the skin looks visibly younger.
item.content:encoded:
Dior Prestige Le Nectar de Nuit is concentrated in the most precious fraction of Rose de Granville: its very first buds. They potentiate the skin’s nighttime cell regeneration for 8 hours*. Signs of aging are more rapidly, intensely and deeply corrected.
Upon the first application, the skin regains a fine, even texture and its radiance is boosted. Wrinkles are smoothed and signs of fatigue are diminished.
Night after night, the skin looks visibly younger.

item.title: Dior Prestige White
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Light and airy despite its rich powers, the Dior Prestige White Crme leaves the skin divinely smooth, even and luminous. Applied after Le Srum, it swathes the skin in velvety pleasure, infused with intense, lasting action. The skin appears more youthful than ever, glowing with vital brightness.
item.content:encoded:
This UV base envelops the skin in a tailor-made protective veil with lasting wear and proven effectiveness. The incredibly light and silky texture offers a feeling of absolute comfort. Perfectly protected for 8 hours, the skin glows with a new luminosity.
The Dior expert tip: apply UV Base to the entire face. Spread the base from the center outwards and slightly upwards. This enveloping technique ensures the highest protection while smoothing the face. Complete the application by blending the texture from the chin towards the neck, and from the contours of the face towards the hairline and brow line, for a seamless finish. Apply before your makeup.

item.description: This UV base envelops the skin in a tailor-made protective veil with lasting wear and proven effectiveness. Complete the application by blending the texture from the chin towards the neck, and from the contours of the face towards the hairline and brow line, for a seamless finish. Apply before your makeup.
item.content:encoded:
This UV base envelops the skin in a tailor-made protective veil with lasting wear and proven effectiveness. The incredibly light and silky texture offers a feeling of absolute comfort. Perfectly protected for 8 hours, the skin glows with a new luminosity.
The Dior expert tip: apply UV Base to the entire face. Spread the base from the center outwards and slightly upwards. This enveloping technique ensures the highest protection while smoothing the face. Complete the application by blending the texture from the chin towards the neck, and from the contours of the face towards the hairline and brow line, for a seamless finish. item.title: Dior Prestige
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
Enriched with ultra-nourishing vine wax, the creamy, melt-away texture of La Crme deeply and lastingly nourishes the driest skin and envelops it in absolute comfort.
The Dior tip: apply morning and evening to face, neck and dcollet. Glide over your face with a smoothing stroke to fully benefit from the powers of LOr de Vie. Continue down to the neck and dcollet: your hands join together under the chin, gently gliding downwards to envelop your neck and dcollet.
item.content:encoded: Applied after the Nectar de Nuit, its rich and opulent balm-like texture literally wraps the skin, deeply comforting and plumping it. It is also ideal for the delicate areas of the neck and dcollet, which regain strength and density.

item.title: LOr de Vie
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
Enriched with ultra-nourishing vine wax, the creamy, melt-away texture of La Crme deeply and lastingly nourishes the driest skin and envelops it in absolute comfort.
The Dior tip: apply morning and evening to face, neck and dcollet. Glide over your face with a smoothing stroke to fully benefit from the powers of LOr de Vie. Continue down to the neck and dcollet: your hands join together under the chin, gently gliding downwards to envelop your neck and dcollet.
item.content:encoded:
Enriched with ultra-nourishing vine wax, the creamy, melt-away texture of La Crme deeply and lastingly nourishes the driest skin and envelops it in absolute comfort.

The Dior tip: apply morning and evening to face, neck and dcollet. Glide over your face with a smoothing stroke to fully benefit from the powers of LOr de Vie. Continue down to the neck and dcollet: your hands join together under the chin, gently gliding downwards to envelop your neck and dcollet.
